title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.1 - Application

State Regulations

Tickets may be sold only within New York State by
licensed sales agents. Any person may apply for a license to become a lottery
sales agent by submitting a completed application form to the commission and
any supplements thereto as may be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5001.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
